verses.verse: "How have you <S%H5826>helped<s%> him who is without <S%H3581>power!<s%> How have you <S%H3467>saved<s%> the <S%H2220>arm<s%> that has <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5797>strength!<s%>
How have you counseled him who has <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H7230>plentifully<s%> <S%H3045>declared<s%> sound <S%H8454>knowledge!<s%>
To whom have you <S%H5046>uttered<s%> <S%H4405>words?<s%> Whose <S%H5397>spirit<s%> came forth from <S%H3318>you?<s%>
"Those who are <S%H7496>deceased<s%> <S%H2342>tremble,<s%> those beneath the <S%H4325>waters<s%> and all that live in <S%H7931>them.<s%>
<S%H7585>Sheol<s%> is <S%H6174>naked<s%> before <S%H11>God,<s%> and Abaddon has no <S%H3682>covering.<s%>
He stretches <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> over empty <S%H8414>space,<s%> and <S%H8518>hangs<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> on <S%H1099>nothing.<s%>
He binds <S%H6887>up<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in his thick <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> is not burst under <S%H1234>them.<s%>
He <S%H270>encloses<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and <S%H6576>spreads<s%> his cloud on <S%H6051>it.<s%>
He has <S%H2328>described<s%> a <S%H2706>boundary<s%> on the surface of the <S%H6440>waters,<s%> and to the <S%H8503>confines<s%> of <S%H216>light<s%> and <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
The <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H7322>tremble<s%> and are <S%H8539>astonished<s%> at his <S%H1606>rebuke.<s%>
He <S%H7280>stirs<s%> up the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with his <S%H3581>power,<s%> and by his <S%H8394>understanding<s%> he <S%H4272>strikes<s%> through <S%H7293>Rahab.<s%>
By his <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H8235>garnished.<s%> His <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H2342>pierced<s%> the <S%H1281>swift<s%> <S%H5175>serpent.<s%>

<S%H7098>Behold,<s%> these are but the outskirts of his <S%H1870>ways.<s%> How <S%H8102>small<s%> a <S%H1697>whisper<s%> do we <S%H8085>hear<s%> of <S%H7482>him!<s%> But the thunder of his <S%H1369>power<s%> who can <S%H995>understand?<s%>"
